product.title: Daytona Shark Grey - Plantation Shutter
product.description: In prettiest pale grey, the daytona in shark grey is sweet and subtle. The durable, high quality faux wood that it's made from is water-resistant, so won't warp or crack in any room in the home. Choose from three shutter styles: tier on tier, full height, or caf. Team the shark grey with a pure red tone for a strong and stylish colour scheme, perfect for a contemporary home. Keep the red to a minimum to avoid overpowering the room and include plenty of white and grey tones.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Rock Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant, stockholm rock roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Mid Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm mid grey roller blinds are a beautiful contemporary cool grey colour. A timeless grey colour that will compliment most color palettes within the home or office. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with smooth control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your space. Also, their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee providing additional peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.description: Sleek, straightforward and stylish, this valencia touchstone grey roller blind is perfect for adding warmth to a contemporary space. The pebbly grey fabric is chic and fashionable, but has an earthy tone that lends a little more cosiness. Its a hardwearing fabric too, easy to c sleek, straightforward and stylish, this valencia touchstone grey roller blind is perfect for adding warmth to a contemporary space.

relproducts.title: Galaxy Plantation Green Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The warm tones of the galaxy plantation roman blind are sure to enrich your space. Making the most of a plain design, the curtain features a defined woven finish that gives an attractive textural effect. The fabric is woven with silvery metallic yarn alongside earthy tones of green to create a surprise touch of sparkle. relproducts.description: Complement your design scheme with the warm earthy tones of the galaxy plantation green curtain. Drawing strength from a simple design, the curtain features a defined woven texture for an appealing rustic style. The finished effect has hidden depths in the form of a subtle sparkle from metallic yarn incorporated into the green weave. relproducts.title: Daytona Vivid White - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: White doesn't get much whiter or brighter than the daytona in vivid white. This icy white hue covers the durable faux wood of the shutter flawlessly, and works wonderfully as any of their different style options: tier on tier, caf, or full height. Pair the vivid white with any colour scheme you like, but for a truly striking style, stick to an all-white theme in an open-plan kitchen. Think white walls, white units, white floor, white everything - the look will be bold and vivacious, and certainly hard to forget.

relproducts.title: Daytona Horizon Grey - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: Soft and subtle, the daytona in horizon grey is a pretty shade of grey that works as an attractive neutral for stronger tones. The durable, high quality faux wood the shutter is made from is energy efficient, water-resistant, and not prone to warping or cracking. Choose from three distinct shutter types. Match the horizon grey to a rich red feature wall for a look that really stands out. This cosy colour scheme is perfect for a living room.

relproducts.title: Daytona Antique White - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: Daytona's antique white offers a beautiful classic white with a vintage overtone. The faux wood is durable and resistant to cracking and warping from moisture, wear, and tear. It's also an energy efficient solution for your home. Choose from three different styles. Use the antique white as part of a shabby chic or vintage dcor scheme, surrounding it with dusky shades of pink or blue for a pretty yet elegant look in a bedroom or living room.

relproducts.title: Daytona Dignity Grey - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: An attractive mid-grey, the dignity grey, from the daytona range, can be the star of the show or the colour-popping neutral. Choose from versatile tier on tier, traditional full height, or boutique caf styles. Team the dignity grey with a dark grass green for an unusual and quirky colour scheme that brings the outside in. Try this for a striking look in the dining room or den. Include the occasional pale grey to lighten the look and add some extra depth to the theme.

relproducts.title: Daytona Cool White - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: Available in three distinct yet equally lovely styles, the daytona cool white is neutral, calming, and stylish. Go for the caf for a boutique look, full height for a classic shutter, or tier on tier for something with a difference and plenty of flexibility. Set the cool white against equally cool pastel shades, such as mint green or baby blue. Accessorise throughout with matching pastel hues, as well as plenty of white.

relproducts.title: Daytona Soho - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: In attractive grey-toned cream, the daytona soho is the perfect neutral. It will work with a number of colour schemes and is available in three distinct styles of shutter. The water-resistant faux wood is guaranteed not to crack or warp, making it ideal for bathrooms and kitchens. Settle the soho into a bedroom, living room, or master bedroom full of coordinating shades of grey, including charcoal greys, dove greys, and oatmeal greys.

relproducts.title: Daytona Linen - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: The pretty cream tone of the daytona in linen is soft and cosy, and covers the shutters flawlessly. Durable, water-resistant faux wood means no cracking and no warping, making them perfect for any room in the home, even bathrooms and kitchens. Settle the linen amidst warm chocolate browns and subtle lattes for a relaxing and luxurious look in the master bedroom or living room. Keep the room feeling light and airy with plenty of matching creams and lots of light.

Created from practical upvc, this smart and durable faux wood shutter is an enduring option for revamping your windows. relproducts.title: Daytona Stratus Grey - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: Cool, calm, and bang on trend, the dove grey tone of the daytona in stratus grey is soothing and serene. All of the daytona range are made from high quality, durable faux wood, and are available in three unique styles: full height, caf, or tier on tier. Go for a fashion-forward choice of colour scheme by pairing the stratus grey with a dusky pink tone for a look that's both romantic and contemporary at the same time.

relproducts.title: Daytona Platinum Grey - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: The pale, serene platinum grey from the daytona range is pretty and subtle, making it the perfect alternative to white or cream. Choose from three styles: the classic full height, the boutique caf, or the versatile tier on tier. Use the platinum grey to complement any colour scheme. Try it with a bold plum purple for a striking and moody look in a dining room, furnishing with dark to medium woods and plenty of shimmering silvers to add a little glitz and glamour.

relproducts.title: Daytona Pigeon Grey - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: The soft, barely-there grey hue of the daytona in pigeon grey is subtle and serene. The flawlessly painted faux wood is durable and water-resistant, so there's no need to worry about cracking or warping. Choose from full height, tier on tier, or caf. Blend the pigeon grey with soft blues for a calming ambience in room made for relaxing, such as the living room or a nursery. Include plenty of plush fabrics to make the room welcoming and comfortable, opting for chenilles and soft wools.

relproducts.title: Daytona Dolphin Grey - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: The daytona in dolphin grey shows a classic light grey tone that will work in any surrounding, traditional or contemporary. Made from durable, high quality faux wood, it is designed to resist cracking and warping. Choose from three unique, attractive styles: tier on tier, full height, or caf. relproducts.title: Daytona Falcon Grey - Plantation Shutter

Settle the falcon grey into a neutrally toned room filled with greys, beiges, oatmeals, and creams. The end result will be one of understated luxe, and you'll find it relaxing and serene, perfect for a bedroom or living room.
